name: Hyperdrive Hunter
description:
Hunt down your targets—Blow up anything in your way. About

You are the Hyperdrive Hunter, a mercenary for hire known for his agility, brute force, and unreasonably high fees. Fly through space and use your hyperdrive to jump from battle to battle as you hunt down targets.

Story

A new terrorist group called The Storm is threatening a client’s spaceport. All you need to do is break through their fleet, destroy their war machines, assassinate their leader, and blow up their spaceport. It shouldn’t be too hard.

Features

This game is an 8-bit shoot ‘em up where you shoot down waves of pixel art space ships. It features a story mode and an endless mode. Each level in story mode has a difficult boss fight. You can also play as different ship types that fit your play style better. There’s a light, medium, and heavy ship. All of them have their own special ability.
